## SmithyLambdaIntegrationProps interface

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 


**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface SmithyLambdaIntegrationProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [allowTestInvoke?](./smithy-cdk.smithylambdaintegrationprops.allowtestinvoke) | <code>readonly</code> | boolean | **_(BETA)_** _(Optional)_ Only applicable when generating default permissions. Enable to also generate default permissions to allow API Gateway to invoke the lambda while testing from the AWS console |
|  [credentialsRole?](./smithy-cdk.smithylambdaintegrationprops.credentialsrole) | <code>readonly</code> | iam.IRole | **_(BETA)_** _(Optional)_ IAM Role API Gateway should use to invoke the Lambda. If left undefined the integration will generated default permissions when bound to an API path. |
